asset.author: breville

transcripts: Introducing the 7 quart slow cooker. Designed with the modern rectangular silhouette and featuring that easy stove top insert; one pot cooking has never been easier. And because its got silicon handles, you can actually take it out and saute your onions and garlic straight on your stove top and then take it back to your slow cooker. Slow cooking combines an infusion of flavors. The longer cooking process also tenderizes cuts of meat making it a great thing for great results. As a general rule, slow cooking takes between 4 to 12 hours but this all depends on the types of foods and your cooking temperature. Low setting would be for pot roast and tougher cuts of meats and stirring is not required. This 7 quart cooker with easy see stuff insert another great Innovation by Breville.
